name: Monstermörder
description:
The world has ended!

You and your team must stay alive and fight through the monsters that just seem to keep coming. All you have are your weapons and the help of your team. There are things to find along the way such as Power-Ups, Special Weapons, and Health. As you travel, you must be aware that the monsters will drive you insane. You need to watch your sanity level and stay sharp by grabbing medication to keep you and your team clear headed to fight.

We would like to invite everyone to 'Play with the Devs' You can join us in our discord and play along with us. If you would like to share any issues you find, want tips how to get through a certain map or just want to play multiplayer we are here to play with you.
